message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Let's flip the script, 60-40 in my favor this time.  It's only fair after your generous offer. ðŸ˜‰
I can do 58-42, it's a better deal for you than my first offer. Don't let the money lose more value.

Come on, 55-45 is more than fair. We're both losing money here.
This is my final offer. 80/20, or we both walk away with nothing. It's your call.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm guessing you don't want to walk away with nothing either. 52-48, let's end this.
